titleStmt.title: The change: or, the blind eye opened. A double discourse on Ephes. 5.8. Yee were sometimes darknesse, but now are yee light in the Lord shewing the great alteration that is wrought in a man regenerate from what he was in his unregeneracy. Presented, first to the eare, now to the publike eye, by the author Thomas Dugard, Mr. of Arts, Cambr.
titleStmt.author: Dugard, Thomas, b. 1587 or 8.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by G.M. for George Edwards dwelling in Greene-Arbour at the signe of the Angell,

notesStmt.note: Copy filmed at UMI microfilm Early English Books 1641-1700 reel 2427 lacks all after page [27].
Reproduction of original in the Dr. Williams' Library.
